Content:: Guns of the Black Witch (Italian: Il terrore dei mari) is a 1961 adventure film directed by Domenico Paolella.[3][4] Guns of the Black Witch was released in Italy on 24 February 1961.[1] It was released in the United States in December 1961.[1] The Monthly Film Bulletin declared the film to be a "very tepid affair" and that "even the Caribbean looks unenticing in this representation, and Paolella's direction makes heavy weather of the action."[2]  This article related to an Italian film of the 1960s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about an adventure film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
